item.title: Instagram for Business
item.description:
Instagram for Business

Social media is an incredibly powerful tool - and Instagram is one of the most powerful, so why not use it to its full advantage? With well over 400 million users worldwide, there is an incredibly large audience just waiting to discover your brand.

item.title: How A Man's Fitbit Got Him The Medical Care He Needed
item.description:
How A Man's Fitbit Got Him The Medical Care He Needed

On Jan. 5, a man checked into a hospital's emergency room in Camden, New Jersey. Because his heart was beating irregularly, doctors suspected he had atrial fibrillation, the most common type of arrhythmia, which can increase the risk of stroke. But to decide how to treat him, they needed to know exactly how long his heart had been acting up.

item.title: Fuseproject's Three-Port Zolt Charger
item.description:
Fuseproject's Three-Port Zolt Charger

Launching today, the Zolt Laptop Charger aims to make powering all your devices faster, easier and much less cumbersome. The charger-designed by fuseproject -is a sleek, lightweight device with three USB ports. This translates to charging three devices (laptop, phone, smartwatch, portable phone-charger, you name it) all at once-while only using one power outlet.

item.title: Moleskine's Comprehensive Smart Writing Set
item.description:
Moleskine's Comprehensive Smart Writing Set

At a conference on productivity-which touched on everything from the importance of tech-free alone time to the educational and emotional benefits of writing by hand (as outlined in a series of studies on the subject)- Moleskine unveiled their latest analog-to-digital wonder.

item.title: Super stylli: our pick of the finest (and most stylish) smart-pens.
item.description:
Super stylli: our pick of the finest (and most stylish) smart-pens.

Before touchpads, the stylus was at the cutting edge of data entry. And while designers and CAD operators remain devoted to the device, the advent of the touchscreen has sparked fresh interest in stylish stylii. Silicon Valley's big players are now rolling out a new era of smart stationery.
